relnotes.name: Bluetooth Profiles
relnotes.purpose: An implementation, protocol and API for the Bluetooth Phone Book Access Profile (PBAP)

defect.title: .esk and .cmi files do not have header

relnotes.defect: Added copyright headers

defect.title: [Coverity]-SYMBIAN.CLEANUP_STACK -bluetooth/latest

relnotes.defect: Mark coverity error as intentional.

defect.title: Semi-colon shown in contact name on PBAP device

relnotes.defect: Added code to obtain missing fields from both pathways (via db view; not via db view).

defect.title: Dependency failures with PBAP components when __BT_DEBUG__ defined.

relnotes.defect: Updated iby files, btlogger.dll was missing.

defect.title: PBAP server panic 19 when pulling call history

relnotes.defect: Delete the iAsyncExporter when the server gets the notification.

defect.title: Errors in SDP reported by tool SDP Record Verified

relnotes.defect: Removed the serviceID attribute.

defect.title: PBAP Service Availability record is incorrect

relnotes.defect: Corrected the service availability attribute for the PBAP SDP record to follow the specification.

defect.title: PBAP does not handle low power modes

relnotes.defect: Request Sniff mode when a connection to PBAP is established and request Active mode when it is required.

defect.title: Problem with __UREL_RDEBUG_PRINT macro in bt generic logger

relnotes.defect: Fixed RDebug Output during UDEB builds

defect.title: Problem with __UREL_RDEBUG_PRINT macro in bt generic logger

relnotes.defect: Fixed RDebug Output during UDEB builds

defect.title: [Rosetta] PBAP doesn't advert it's service availability

relnotes.defect: Added a new function pbapserver::UpdateAvailability.

defect.title: Bluetooth PBAP KERN EXEC 3

relnotes.defect: Ensure that iAsyncRestartObex is not NULL before using it

defect.title: PBAP panics if Obex error occurs

relnotes.defect: Make PBAP handle an error from OBEX gracefully

defect.title: PBAP connection problem with BH-902 and BH-903

relnotes.defect: PBAP connection problem with BH-902 and BH-903

defect.title: [Mini-UPF] PBAP Removing all CH entries results in wrong error reported to PCE

relnotes.defect: DEF105855: [Mini-UPF] PBAP Removing all CH entries results in wrong error reported to PCE

defect.title: [upf27] PBAP Ignores maxlistcount when appending owner card

relnotes.defect: DEF108219: [upf27] PBAP Ignores maxlistcount when appending owner card

defect.title: [Mini-UPF] Changing PBAP handles during download causes panic

relnotes.defect: fix changing PBAP handles during download causes panic

defect.title: PBAP vCard holds spec violating typo

relnotes.defect: KVersitParamDIALED spelling corrected

defect.title: Ensure Shortlink files have correct IM tags

relnotes.defect: Removed unecessary exports of header files

defect.title: Codenomicon testcase #5167 causes !PBAP to crash

relnotes.defect: Fix PBAP crashes when receive a bad app header from client

defect.title: [Mini-UPF] PBAP invalid/unknown name header still results in valid vCard listing

relnotes.defect: PBAP invalid/unknown name header still results in valid vCard listing

defect.title: PBAP Alphabetical or Phonetic sort orders do not include empty owner card

relnotes.defect: In case of own cardâ€™s absence, an empty own card is added to the end of search results in alphabetic or phonetic order.

defect.title: UPF26: PBAP is not in public browse group

relnotes.defect: PBAP is now included in Public Browse Group
